name: graphicsScene.py
instructions: Draw two pieces of seaweed and a fish. seaweed1 must be behind the fish and seaweed2 must be in front of it.
code:
# Import '*' (i.e., everything) from cs1graphics
from cs1graphics import *

# seaweed2 in front of the fish (partially obscures the fish's body)
seaweed2 = Path(
    Point(340, 500), Point(332, 480), Point(345, 457), Point(330, 435),
    Point(338, 415)
)

# seaweed1 behind the fish
seaweed1 = Path(
Point(370, 500), Point(375, 487), Point(363, 460), Point(370, 446),
    Point(365, 420), Point(373, 400)
)
